name: CrimeBots
description:
Program friendly little bots to commit a variety of crimes.  Open play space.  Experiment with the robot's code to find new behaviors.  Make a lot of botcoins.  Have fun!

Controls:

Tab - Cycles betwen robots

Clicking a robot opens their programming UI

Stop a robot's program before editing it

Start the program again once you're done editing, look out for errors being displayed

Left Shift - Speeds up time x10

Escape - Pause menu
